subject: Advertising and Marketing
Television
lead_paragraph: Just for Men’s commercial with Keith Hernandez and Walt Frazier as barside analysts of Miss Hottie’s brush-off of poor Mr. Graybeard is still running after nearly five and a half years.
snippet: Just for Men’s commercial with Keith Hernandez and Walt Frazier as barside analysts of Miss Hottie’s brush-off of poor Mr. Graybeard is still running after nearly five and a half years.
